page.title: 14Favourite Games at Ladock.
page.content:
When I did my survey,{rounders and {hide and seek}were most popular. A lot of people liked rounders because it's {active and fun.}When I asked the top class, a lot of the children liked the batting best and catching the ball. Not many people liked to be fielders. Hide and seek: the infant class liked this best because it's fun to play and quite a lot of children liked seeking.
{This is how to play rounders: When you set it up you have four posts set out in a square. When you've done that, you have two teams; one fielding and one batting. When the batsman hits the ball he has to run around the square of posts to score one rounder. He can be got out by touching a post before he gets there or by catching the ball when he has hit it. When all the team is out then the fielders bat.
